entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The name 'Resources' is reserved and cannot be used. #10531
  • Inconsistencies with ColumnSpacing and missing columns in a Grid #10528
  • Couldn't run the emulator #10527
  • Publish app not rendering images. #10526
    Backlog
  • Shell navigation PopToRoot does not work on Windows if stack size > 2 #10524
    Backlog
  • Update Visual Studio's UI to allow developers to add platform-specific NuGets for MAUI SingleProject projects #10521
    Backlog
  • dotnet tool restore on Net7 repo Get error : blocked #10519
  • FlexLayout exception when window is very small #10518
    Backlog
  • BackbuttonBehavior with custom command throws 'Object reference not set to an instance of an object' exception. #10514
    Backlog

Closed

  • .NET MAUI Blazor mouse events not firing #8393
    7.0
  • Strange code fragments #10517
    Backlog
  • Button text not rendered properly in RTL flow direction #2880
    Backlog
  • Runs in Windows Emulator, Throws System.NullReferenceException error in Android Emulator. Don't know where to start. #10249
  • this.Height is -1 in Page_loaded() in Android Maui. #10281
  • Images and FontImageSource do not display in ios 16 #10392
  • Android Editor doesn't render text the full width of the displayed field #10505
  • Navigation.PopModalAsync fails on Android if page is a NavigationView [.Net7] #10513
  • Backwards tab navigation cannot move focus away from a Windows Forms BlazorWebView #8293
    7.0
  • Blazor CSS Isolation bundle is not deployed to local iOS device #7468
    7.0
  • Blazor App Menu not rendered in IOS #7600
  • Generate unplated icons on Windows #6164
    7.0
  • TabBar control does not function normally in IOS. But it works fine on Android. #8786
  • AppIcon shows a border on windows taskbar #5162
    Backlog
  • Permission Denied returned when approximate location is selected #10053
    Backlog
  • The collectionView Item does not respond to visibility change #10512
  • Workloads installation broken after attempt to install maui from 'main' branch #7008
  • Not able to link .a iOS library #7670
  • Preview Update for 17.3.0 Preview 4 Really hosed my MAUI install #8984
  • SearchBox Background #10357
    Backlog
  • An Android app crashes or hangs when I try to obtain a StackTrace after calling a method via reflection in try/catch block #10216
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't fire appearing/disappearing with window #10530
  • Fix catalyst secondary click to match windows #10525
  • [Android] Improve CollectionView scrolling #10523
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/perf 🏎️, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Android] Fix SwipeItemView size issues #10522
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, control-swipeview
  • Generate a more complete splash screen drawable set for Android #10516
    area/single project ☝️
  • [Tizen] Fixes Tizen SemanticScreenReader using a new Accessibility API #10511
    area/a11y, community ✨

Merged

  • Fix a few places we almost properly check for null #10529
    7.0
  • Don't force the TextDirection on Android unless the content direction can't be determined #10132
    platform/android 🤖, area/localization, 7.0
  • Generate unplated icons on Windows #10515
    area/single project ☝️, 7.0
  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.1.4 to 1.1.5 #10119
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Added pending changes to Essentials Permissions from Xamarin.Forms #10092
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞

Updated

  • [Android] Ensure SearchView meets min size requirements #10510
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Implement PointerGestureRecognizer for Android #10352
    area/gestures
  • [Windows] Display alerts by Window #10368
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert
  • [Windows] Map the Window title to the automation name property #10159
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/a11y
